data.title: University of South Carolina
data.text:
Connectivity

Wi-Fi: Yes

Internet Connection: Yes (1 per room)

Cable is not available in the residence halls.

Access

Floors:5

Elevator: Yes

Keycard Access: Yes

Facilities

Laundry Room: First floor

Room

Living/Dining Room: 13' x 10'

Kitchen: 13' x 5'3"

Bedroom:9' x 10'

Bathroom: 5'5" x 5'7"

Living Room Window: 44" wide x 68" tall

Bedroom Window: 44" wide x 68" tall

Shower Curtain Size: 60" wide x 78" long

Shower Dimensions: 58" wide x 75 1/2" tall

Space Under Sink: 28" tall x 27" deep x 40" wide

Ceiling Height: 115"

Wall Type: Drywall

Microfridge Rental: No

Bedroom Furniture

Bed Size: 80" (extra long twin)

Bed Frame: 41" wide x 88" long x 36" tall

Maximum Bed Height: 34"

Desk:25" deep x 43" wide x 30" tall

Desk Chair: 24" deep x 19" wide x 36 " tall

Dresser:21" deep x 31" wide x 45" tall

Dresser Drawers:5 1/2" deep (5 drawers)

Closet: 23" deep x 32" wide x 108" tall

Loftable Bed: Yes, please reference the policy.

Living Room Furniture

Couch: 33" deep x 53" wide x 33" tall

Lounging Chairs: 31" deep x 28" wide x 32" tall

Side Table: 18" deep x 22" wide x 17" tall

Coffee Table: 24" deep x 42" wide x 17" tall

Dining Room Table: 35 wide x 30" tall

Dining Room Chairs: 19' deep x 18" wide x 31" tall

Floor plans, layouts, dimensions and features may vary.
